criteria.long_description: Depth, accuracy, and relevance of content provided

ratings.long_description: Content is exceptionally thorough, highly accurate, and demonstrates deep understanding. All required elements are present and exceed expectations.
Content is complete, accurate, and demonstrates solid understanding. All required elements are present and meet expectations.
Content is mostly complete but may have minor inaccuracies or gaps. Most required elements are present.
Content has significant gaps or inaccuracies. Several required elements are missing or incomplete.
Content is minimal, largely inaccurate, or missing most required elements.

criteria.long_description: Logical flow, clear structure, and effective organization of ideas

ratings.long_description: Exceptionally well-organized with clear, logical flow. Ideas are presented in a coherent sequence that enhances understanding.
Well-organized with good flow. Ideas follow a logical sequence and are easy to follow.
Generally organized but may have some unclear transitions or sequencing issues.
Poorly organized with unclear structure. Ideas are difficult to follow.
No clear organization or structure evident.

criteria.long_description: Demonstration of analytical skills and critical evaluation

ratings.long_description: Demonstrates exceptional analytical skills. Provides insightful connections, evaluates multiple perspectives, and draws well-supported conclusions.
Demonstrates solid analytical skills. Makes relevant connections and draws appropriate conclusions supported by evidence.
Demonstrates basic analytical skills. Some connections are made but analysis may be superficial or incomplete.
Minimal analytical thinking evident. Analysis is superficial or lacks supporting evidence.
No analytical thinking or critical evaluation evident.

criteria.long_description: Grammar, spelling, punctuation, and overall writing mechanics

ratings.long_description: Writing is clear, concise, and error-free. Excellent command of grammar, spelling, and punctuation.
Writing is clear with minimal errors. Good command of grammar, spelling, and punctuation.
Writing is generally clear but contains some errors that may distract from meaning.
Writing contains numerous errors that interfere with understanding.
Writing quality is very poor with pervasive errors.

criteria.long_description: Appropriate use of sources and proper citation format

ratings.long_description: Excellent use of relevant, credible sources. All citations are properly formatted and integrated smoothly into the text.
Good use of relevant sources. Citations are generally proper with minor formatting issues.
Adequate use of sources but may lack variety or credibility. Some citation errors present.
Minimal use of sources or frequent citation errors. Sources may lack credibility.
No sources cited or pervasive citation problems.
